entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: Occlumency is a magical technique that Harry is trying to learn. It is mentioned as his 'first foray into Occlumency'.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story and is mentioned as being happy for the first time in fourteen years.

relationships.description: Harry's attempt at Occlumency has weakened his mind's resistance, which is somehow connected to Lord Voldemort's happiness.
